label: axiom-well-behaved-rescale-function
statement: Any function $g_A: \mathbb{R} \to \mathbb{R}_{>0}$ chosen for the rescale transformation must satisfy the following properties: (1) C^1 Smoothness - continuously differentiable on $\mathbb{R}$, (2) Monotonicity - $g'_A(z) \ge 0$ for all $z \in \mathbb{R}$, (3) Uniform Boundedness - range is bounded $(0, g_{A,\max}]$ for finite $g_{A,\max} > 0$, (4) Global Lipschitz Continuity - $\sup_{z \in \mathbb{R}} |g'_A(z)| = L_{g_A} < \infty$.
name: Axiom of a Well-Behaved Rescale Function
